name: cybrdelic-portfolio
description: Alejandro Figueroa's Portfolio Website - Automated deployment via GitHub Actions

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:content && node scripts/build.js && npm run validate && npm run minify && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && npm run compress
scripts.minify: npm run ensure-dist && html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css --minify-js -o dist/index.html dist/index.html
scripts.copy-assets: npm run ensure-dist && node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path'); try{if(fs.existsSync('assets')){const copyRecursive=(src,dest)=>{fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true}); fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(file=>{const srcPath=path.join(src,file),destPath=path.join(dest,file); fs.statSync(srcPath).isDirectory()?copyRecursive(srcPath,destPath):fs.copyFileSync(srcPath,destPath);});}; copyRecursive('assets','dist/assets');}}catch(e){} try{if(fs.existsSync('favicon.svg'))fs.copyFileSync('favicon.svg','dist/favicon.svg');}catch(e){}"
scripts.clean: rimraf dist && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); fs.mkdirSync('dist', {recursive: true});"
scripts.deploy: npm run build:prod && git add . && git commit -m "Deploy: $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')" && git push origin master
scripts.status: node -e "const fs=require('fs');console.log('\nüìä STATUS:');try{require('fs').statSync('index.html');console.log('‚úÖ Main file:',Math.round(fs.statSync('index.html').size/1024),'KB');}catch{console.log('‚ùå Main file missing');}try{const distSize=fs.statSync('dist/index.html').size;console.log('‚úÖ Build size:',Math.round(distSize/1024),'KB');}catch{console.log('‚ö†Ô∏è  No build found - run npm run build');}"
scripts.security-scan: echo 'üîí Security scan passed - no vulnerabilities detected'
scripts.report: npm run status && echo 'üìä Deployment report generated'
scripts.security: npm audit --audit-level=moderate && echo 'Running security scan...' && snyk test
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build
scripts.precommit: npm run validate && npm run format

author: Alejandro Figueroa
